I'm not sure how it can get any better, especially now that it syncs with the partner exercise application. Each week - each month - I find a new efficiency, like the menu feature. (Edition: MyNet Diary - D)

title: Great App
body: This is a great app for anyone who has diabetes or blood sugar issues. It takes a little while to set everything up, but once you get rolling it's amazing how fast and efficient this app is. I really like the"PhotoFood" option. With this option you can take pictures of products that may not already be in their database (and they have a lot of foods in their database) and they will try and have it entered within 24 hours. What a great idea!

title: Incredibly helpful
body: Since being diagnosed with T1 Diabetes just 7 days ago this app has been incredibly helpful. Tracking my insulin injections, BG, calories, carbs and weight gain has been a breeze with this app. The ability to scan a barcode and have it automatically add nutritional information makes the app very useful. I showed the report functionality to my diabetic educator and she as very excited to see it. Highly recommended and worth every penny.

title: Diabetics Check This Out
body: After trying another app which has a lot of great ratings, I found it was outdated and tedious to use. Don't be fooled, this app is far superior and much easier to use. I am using it to track my blood glucose, meals, exercise, weight, and medication. This app makes it a breeze. The nutritional information has the most entries I have found, and for the foods not in there, it's easy to add. This app is definitely the better choice.

title: Best for diabetics
body: I used to use a different app on my phone until I found this. I love it !!!

title: My friendly guru
body: It is so helpful to organize all that has to do with my metabolic issues. The food database is so complete or easy to add custom information. The glycemic grade  has helped how certain food is bad for my system. I wish to understand how it merges info with ihealth like the Pro Version. It would be better if the syn with ihealth gets more efficient. I don't understand why the diabetes version doesn't sync with ihealth as the Pro one. PLEASE WORK SMOOTHLY WITH IHEALTH... please

title: Excellent program
body: I am a software design engineer and this program is about as good as one gets. Both the iOS and the Mac versions are fantastic. Diabetes module is well worth the extra money if you need it. This program has helped me lose over 20lbs and get my blood sugar stabile at a normal level in only two months. My doctor was blown away at the details and information available in the reports and charts. Highly rated!!!

title: Great app!  Covers all areas of diabetes management
body: This app covers everything.  I can plan my meals and snacks for the day.  I can plan my meds, vitamins.  I can log all of my glucose readings so that when I go to the doctor, I just hand him my phone and let him scroll thru.  The only thing that could beat this is a watch that measures glucose.  I've also used Glucosuccess but it's not as thorough and depends on multiple apps whereas this is everything in one.

title: Extremely useful
body: I have used this app for years--upgraded to the Pro version, and then recently upgraded again to the diabetic version when I was diagnosed with diabetes. I use it constantly, and find it so helpful for tracking daily nutrition, charting progress, and making meal choices (I love that it gives me a letter grade for food items I enter!) Great functionality and great features like UPC scan to capture nutrition info. Highly recommend!

title: Best Diabetes App
body: I tried several of the more popular diabetes apps for meal and blood glucose tracking before making a decision about which to use. This is by far the best, most comprehensive, and most functional. The food database is unparalleled and constantly being updated (I can even submit a new food), the recipe creator is great, the user interface is intuitive and informative, the reports/graphs are fantastic.  The app syncs with all my devices and iCloud. Fantastic!

title: Best App I've Used
body: I find this app extremely easy to use. Until I found it, I was using 3 different apps to do everything that is included in this one app. Tracking exercise in one app, glucose tests in another, and water consumption in a third. I am glad I paid for this app. I enjoy the ease of adding new foods not in the database. You can't go wrong for the money if you are a diabetic, an need to track these things as well.

title: Worth every penny
body: I am a mom of a newly found diabetic, and all the things that we have to keep track of this app has. Everything that we were worried about knowing for carbs this app solves it is amazing. I love everything about it. And it really help since my daughter and I are still new to all of this. And it helps that everything is logged in my phone so I can look back on it and let her doctors know how she is doing.

title: ☹️Monthly cost for activity tracker sync 😡 :(
body: MyNetDiary Pro paid for.  Then I was diagnosed with Hyperinsulimic hypoglycemic diabetes so I paid for MyNetDiary Diabetes because this form of diabetes is hard to manage with the roller coaster ride of LO/HI bG.   Exercise usually sends my bG readings low so I thought if I can track food/carbs + bG from CGM + activity from Jawbone UP maybe I can figure out what is and is not working for me.  But the monthly price of linking my UP account to this app is a barrier. Not happy about the monthly subscription.  Please offer a one time low cost or offer this feature free please.

title: Very helpful app
body: This is the best overall diabetes monitoring app I have used. I would like to see it get easier to put in my own recipes. Because of dietary restrictions, I bake with non-commercial blends of GF flour, and cook many non prepared foods. It is a great app for tracking exercise and intake. I think some markers could be updated. Cholesterol is an arguable commodity, so I cringe at eating eggs which my Dr says are beneficial.

title: Upgrade to max
body: Awful..... Lost data.... Customer support is responsive with answers but no help in substance. Find another app..... I use this app every so often and then realize it's not a long term solution seems like I'm always loosing my history. After all the input time I wanted to printout reports for my doctor.... I upgraded from D version to Pro.... That did not support proper printed output. So I'm in the max version now. Lost all my medication tracking and parts of the app did not set up... Then I lost my D version.... Disappeared! Forget this app and move on.....!!!!!!!!

title: Lost 60 lbs and losing more
body: Lost over 60lbs logging in all of the foods i eat along with my fitbit. It also helps me to track my blood sugar level with the chart via subscription. This is a great app but even better when you get to utilize the maximum subscription. Although i was hesitant about subscribing, it was all worth it for my health. I just got diagnosed with diabetes and am trying to reverse it with a healthy diet, exercise and this app.

title: Thank You : MyNetDiary Pro & MyNetDiary Diabetes
body: I began on March 26th 2012 on just MyNetDiary. I absolutely love it! I became Type II diabetic and needed to loose weight. This App has totally helped me in getting my weight into control. I have since lost 35# and now am using MyNetDiary D to record my glucose numbers and I absolutely love the charts and continue to have the incentive I need to continue in a healthy life style. Thank you, my life has changed to a healthy future!

title: Disappointed
body: I spend a lot of time entering good items. Having to enter all the nutritional information for almost every meal is a pain. After months of using this product I have only found three items linked to the barcode and the nutritional value was wrong on two of those. At first I took time to send pictures and barcodes in for updating, with the promise they would be. Well, they haven't been.  This app is not all it promised to be! I wish I could get my money back. I would go back to my fitness pal if it had a way to track blood glucose.

title: Weight lost & insulin reduction
body: My bs were high, i was obese and I had just got another heart stent!  Wake up call!!!

title: Excellent App!
body: I use My Net Diary. For tracking food. But also I use it for tracking my blood sugar, weight, water, as well as my own custom trackers to help me keep on top of my cancer treatment, helps me stay on the lookout for developing side effects of medications, I have to watch out for-that could require hospitalization, such as rise in temperature, reactions, or blood in urine when taking blood thinners, etc. This up date has improved performance.

title: So glad!
body: I've used the original app before and it was great! I had my diabetes well under control until about 2 years ago, life circumstances spiraled! Anyway, when my husband went back to tracking his food, he told me they came out with this version! Doing the happy dance and keeping it in check now! Once you get it set up and have recipes, repeat meals, etc... entered, it's awesome!

title: Keto and Diabetic Awesomeness
body: I first got this app to track keto carbs and then I also saw the blood sugar monitoring and tracking. Not only can I count carbs and calories, scan labels, track water glasses per day and weight, but I can add multiple blood sugar readings per day! It has charts and even reminders. I am really happy with this app as I was really trying to lose weight and track my macro nutrient ratio. Get and make it a part of your lifestyle!

title: Excellent for Type 20
body: I rarely write an app review, but I have great respect for this one. It covers every area of the disease that I can think of. It keeps me accountable and honest. Seeing my numbers along with the other data helps me notice things I would not if I weren't keeping track. It's easy, educational, and I share the info from here with my doctor as it is most accurate. I highly recommend it!

title: Great app
body: Has new features that I still have to try since I just got the update but I am very pleased thus far.  I mainly use it for logging my blood sugar and that is a great help for me.  I also use it for weight and am very pleased so far.  I'm getting more into it and can add more information as I go.

title: Review
body: As recently diagnosed type 2, I really appreciate the simplicity of this app. Especially the food selections are vast and the charts. I love that it remembers all my favorite foods and quantities and it is easier to just select and not time consuming. I like the reminders and the analysis, charts and so on. My doctor that I visit loves to see my blood sugar charts and of course helping me count carbs more importantly and cutting bad calories. Learning so much everyday.

title: Unsuited to serious eaters
body: Main flaw is that people like me who never eat convenience food and seldom eat out have to struggle to find foods in long unsorted lists of branded items and restaurant portions. Consequently, it's impossible to easily enter everyday ingredients in a recipe, so customization is cruelly difficult.

title: MyNetDiary DiabeticVersion
body: I love MOST aspects of the app. My criticism is that the Pro Version is $3.99 compared to the $9.99 I paid for the diabetes version, AND it has functions that this one does not (better exercise tracking).

title: Thank you for the great app!
body: I used it to loose 40lbs and get my type 2 diabetes under control. It was instrumental in helping me achieve my goal, and inform my PCP, Diabetes Nurse and Nutritionist.  I now experience normal blood sugars with just diet and exercise and am hopeful that, with the help of your app, I can maintain this for the rest of my life. The diabetes tracking features are great, and really differentiate you from the pack - keep up the great work!

title: Fantastic app!!! Worth every penny!!!
body: I was recently diagnosed with gestational diabetes and was looking for something to help me stay on track. This is the only app that allows you to scan food into your log (like my fitness pal) but also allows you to monitor carb intake and glucose levels as well. Best $10 you'll ever spend! Even has reports to print or email your dietitian!👍

title: Best Diabetes Teacker App
body: I have type 2 diabetes and I'm young and need to keep my diabetes in track. I test 3 times a day and log my weight as well. This App is very helpful for me to show my doctor my progress or if my blood sugars are high and for how long. It was well worth the money and is a valuable tool to aid in diabetes care. I highly suggest that if you have either form if diabetes that you get the App and use it daily.

title: Excellent app
body: I was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes three months ago. It is by far the best app I have found to help me track my diet, glucose, and weight. I wish they could add a function to the fool check tool that lists the total carbohydrates in the item being checked.

title: Wonderfull Ap
body: I am A newly diagnosed diabetic. Using this app has helped me beyond measure. For the first time in my life I have to track my food intake and watch many things. This app has really helped me to stay on track. It has helped me to understand my habits and to adjust. My doctor looked at me as if I had two heads when I came to my appointment armed with all the information this app has to offer.

title: I live my life with MyNetDiary
body: This is the best app I have used to control my diabetes. It tracks everything from medications to how much insulin I used. It will also tell me how many carbs are in my meals along with calories and other nutrients. It will also keep track of your exercises ether by manual entering it or going through an exercise app. I would highly recommend this for anyone!

title: Best app for my diabetes I've tried!
body: The app is incredibly easy to use. Reminders, if you want to use them; an incredible database of foods that you can look up and add to; and links to articles that are helpful. The recently redesigned dashboard is a joy! It's nice looking, provides helpful information, and is an easy way to input your information. Well worth the price.

title: Absolutely Incredible!!
body: I totally agree that it can be as simple or complex as you want. I like details and this app has them!

title: Great app - just what I needed
body: This app is the perfect tool for me, a newly diagnosed type 2 diabetic.  It syncs with my Fitbit, helps me understand carb/protein/fat ratios and lets me know how I'm doing throughout the day. The reports at the end of the week are especially helpful in terms of knowing what to tweak. Tracking blood glucose with labels is an especially important feature for me as I learn what food combinations more adversely affect these numbers.

title: Nice way to Track
body: I really like the new updates of being able to select when I am testing my blood sugars. I love the at a glance charts to see progress and just the ease of being able to keep track of blood sugars and meds!

title: Not with the upgrade from the other version.
body: This company has 2 apps. If you want medication tracking and symptom tracking, you have to get this version of the app, whether you're a diabetic or not.

title: Finally!! Something to make being diabetic easier...
body: I've been a out if control diabetic for years. I never really found a groove or an easy place to track diet, fitness, and diabetic info...until. It's simple. Intuitive. Worth the price. My specialist loved it so much she is recommending it to all her patients now. :) Really looking forward to the upcoming Fitbit integration they've promised!!!

title: I like this app
body: Overall this app is very good. The only thing that I wish it did better was provide more food choices especially choice that aren't fast food. Sometimes have a hard time finding exact or even near equivalents. Helps greatly though with keeping track of my diet and being diabetic that is important. Kept my A1c at 6.0 last checkup and this app was a great help. Highly recommended!

title: Most awesome app ever!!!
body: I canNOT imagine my life with this app!!! Being able to keep all my information at the tips of my finger is priceless. This app is beyond indispensable! Before I had different log books for blood sugar, one for insulin shots, and another for food. Now everything is in one place and I keep it all updated several times a day. Thank you MyNetDiary!!!

title: Knudscj
body: This is a really good app. It is the best I have used. It has the ability to chart the medicines that I take, track my sleep, if I charge the watch before going to bed, counts the steps and exercise that I have done today. There is a recipe that you write down all the ingredients and then you tell the app how much of the serving you have eaten and it calculates the nutrition and calories eaten.

title: Flexible tracking with lots of options
body: Wonderful app that tracks everything from your blood glucose to your current weight, exercise, food and water intake, medications as well as hundreds more data fields. Customizable and can show graphs of your progress. A must have for anyone tracking their health. Especially useful for the diabetic. Well done!

title: A good app but rigid
body: I bought this to track glucose readings, etc. and it does that well. The food diary is difficult to use in your iPhone compared to apps like MyFitnessPal. The database is meant to be exact but I struggle to find foods and often tap something similar. You do have a barcode reader, and that is great, but I do not seem to use it as readily. Overall, the shortfalls are made up in the value it provides and I use it daily.

title: Best Diabetes Management App
body: I have tried more than 10 apps to help track and control my diabetes. This is by far the best. So easy to track your food, your Blood Glucose measurements, weight, exercise, schedule a BG reading with an audible alarm. It has helped me make changes in my daily life to control my diabetes better, lose weight and to make better choices.

title: Best of the Best!!!!!
body: I'm a Weight Watcher but their app doesn't indicate all the nutrients like this app. This is the most accurate app for diabetics. The food database is extensive and I love being able to scan foods and the way it saves them as favorites automatically. This app works super great and is so economical. I think there are over 750,000 foods in the database. Love it and I never have a problem with it!!!!!

title: Very helpful tool
body: Since I always have my phone with me, I have been able to track calories before I eat. Also helpful to see what foods my blood sugar is sensitive to. You have to become disciplined to entering all the data, but diabetics need to be disciplined with their eating, meds, & exercise anyway and this is a good tool to keep focused. I'll use this app for the rest of my life, even if my Type II goes into remission again!

title: Good app. Suggestions for improvement.
body: I have used your app for every meal for the last month or so. It is good but here are my suggestions. We need a meal summary for total nutrients. We need a way to contact you for suggestions and tech support. We need interface with medical devices to import/export data at least on the web versions of them. Otherwise, it is a good app, as far as it goes.

title: Almost perfect.
body: Love this app, but it's really missing a bolus calculator. Would love to be able to put in my carbs, my current bg, and have it tell me the amount of insulin to take..instead of having to use multiple apps. Also I hate scrolling through to set the time, but I think that's an Apple thing. Otherwise this app is great. Makes management easier to track & simple to show my diabetes healthcare team!!

title: MyNetfiary Plus
body: I love this application because it allows me as a Diabetic Type 2 to have all the pertinent information for my dietitian in one place.  I can place my glucose numbers, medications, nutrition information, weight, blood pressure info, etc. and even email her reports and the insulin team so they can evaluate my progression.  The application made my life easier!!

title: Very Good
body: I have been using this off and on since it first came out. I use it to help me with weight loss and diabetes.

title: Great app!
body: Makes keeping track of meals, glucose levels, water, exercise, and taking meds easy with audible reminders as well as being able to customize meals and input nutritional info from various sources, for example - Panera Bread, Starbucks, etc. The app also links with Apple Health, can be accessed via the web and uploaded to your health team.

title: Great App
body: Overall I really like this app. I appreciate that I have all of the information kept so readily available. I guess that I'm a "natural" food nut and a lot of what I consume is not in the food lists so I have to adjust to what is included in their list. I know that there are steps I can take to have that particular food added but, for me, it is too time consuming to do it. No feedback is given once it is added.

title: A game changer of an app
body: Comprehensive, intuitive, smart. Does it all. The food scanner is amazing, a significant time saver. Two tiny little things I hope they work on: one, show fat totals for each meal instead of just a daily total, and two, better graphics on smarter charts. I would love to see carbs, insulin and blood sugar on the same plot. Love this app. Get it.

title: Worth it
body: I was hesitant initially because of the cost of the app.

title: Best All-Around App
body: This app is very flexible and customizable to fit needs, especially for diabetics.  It is also good for non-diabetics, as it tracks calories, exercise and nutrition in separate breakfast, lunch and dinner modules.  The end of the day analysis is ver beneficial.  Only con is that it doesn't sync the exercise walking with your phones GPS for automatic exercise updates, but it's easy to enter manually.  Great app!

title: Good but bad food database
body: I have been using this app a few weeks now, as it is giving me what I need to track food and glucose.  Very disappointed with the food database.  Most items in it are out of date and incorrect.  You can add your own, but I find it easier to continue to use a free site that I have been using for years.  Too bad the free site doesn't track glucose.

title: Works great tracking glucose levels
body: This is the only food diet tracker that also tracks blood glucose levels. If you want to see the correlation between what you eat and your blood glucose levels, then this is the perfect app for you. I've made adjustments to my diet to keep my glucose at the proper levels.  And I've lost a lot of weight too.

title: Best App
body: Easy to use, cleverly designed so you can use only the features you want, and makes recording food, activities and glucose levels in this diabetes version fun!  Indispensable for me--a daily friend that helps me learn how to be healthier with no fuss.  I look forward to making the quick entries and getting useful feedback regarding trends.

title: Great product
body: I love this app I've been using the non diabetic version for years and just in the last few months switched to this version. I love all the different things you can track in just a single app. I also love the net carbs feature being I follow a LCHF diet this makes looking at my totals super quick.

title: MyNetDiaryD
body: I love that this keeps track of all of my information in one place and in a way that is easy to understand.   I love that it connects with my FitBit so I don't have to remember to add my exercise.  The only thing it's lacking is connectivity to my insulin pump so all of that data would auto-enter, also!  Very glad I found this app!

title: Fantastic App
body: Pretty intuitive and easy to use. Like somebody else said, this app can be as complex or as simple as a user needs. It's a great way to keep track of one's numbers and it's pretty easy to enter in food items. My only complaint is I wish I could print out necessary reports for my doctors in an easy-to-read format without having to purchase a subscription.

title: Father
body: I have been using The app for about 4 1/2 months and have lost 30 pounds. The app is super helpful at staying on track for calories throughout the day and tracking progress as I go along. I strongly recommend this app to anyone trying to lose weight. Watching my diet and exercising every day has been awesome.

title: Helps me a lot!
body: I can track all my meals. I can add items that don't currently exist. I'm learning to change my old habits and relationship with food and calories. It's important to log everything right before you eat it so that you know how many calories you may wasting to decide, is this worth eating?

title: Great
body: A must have if you have diabetes and need to lose or maintain weight.  I have used it daily to monitor weight, calories, carbs, blood glucose, etc.  Have lost about 90 lbs. so far and this has been the main reason.  Tied to my scale and Fitbit and this makes it easy to track all key areas.  This is the best app I have found!!

title: Not really what I wanted
body: My diabetes app was obsolete, and thus seemed the best.  Problem:  once purchased, it forces me to enter all foods I eat, and count calories.  I don't need them to do that.  I did it for 30 years as I got fatter.  I count carbs to lose weight.  Counting calories and writing down all foods I eat is what drove me crazy, and I could not lose weight that way.  It made me hate dieting.  Thin people don't do that.  I prefer just entering the carbs I eat as I have it.  Quick and easy.  I

title: Amazing App
body: Really easy to use, and the food database is incredible. Recently diagnosed type 1 in August, have already been able to get my BG levels fully under control and figured out my insulin to carb ratio. I would recommend getting a food scale for the most accurate results, but it's not required. App is the best out there!

title: Perfect Health Diary
body: This has been a great app for tracking everything I need to cover as I heal up and drop weight. It covers so many things I need to track. Perfect accountability partner. It's worth the money and with the program for PC, I can print charts or use the weekly emails of weekly progress reports to show my doctor how I am doing.

title: My Review/Rave
body: I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes and hypertension. The diet I was placed on combined with the testing and medications was a bit daunting. Using My Net Diary Diabetes version has made the change in lifestyle much less overwhelming. The constantly updated list of specific foods by brand makes calorie counting easy, accurate, and frankly... Enjoyable.

title: Good not Great
body: I will say this is a nice app and good at what it does. But missing several easy fixes. First it needs a insulin calculator. You have all the data, just calculate it. Secondly, app needs to read more than workouts on Apple health. My blood glucose, weight, and all body measurements are on health from my scale. Go get it.   Once the app can do this then I will give it 5 stars for sure. But currently needs to use other apps to get easy things done.

title: My Best Friend
body: Love at first entry! I have a terrible short term memory problem. This keeps me on top of all my meds and times.

title: My net diary D
body: Love this app!  As a diabetic this is very easy to use!  I would love to see the ease of use of this app work with the max program.  I find it easier to input food and diabetic info (bg, insulin doses, and food) into the diabetic app  than the max app. The max app does offer more more tracking and reports.  Hope an update will allow info to flow between the web max program to the diabetic app.

title: Just a few wishes
body: The app is great to summarize carbs and get daily views of carbs, insulin, blood sugars and even calories for weight lose. I only wish it would bring I the steps/calories from my Fitbit versus reading how many steps my phone has been on and I wish it read the blood sugars from my accu-check connect. That would make life that much easier! Great work though.

title: Highly Recommended
body: Probably the best app for monitoring your blood sugar. Very easy, precise, and has thousands of foods in its database. Has really helped me keep track of my health. I do feel like it's just a bit pricey compared to other apps but that doesn't make me change the rating of five stars. Highly recommend.

title: Habitually Helpful
body: This is one of the best apps to track food  and blood sugars.

title: Great app
body: I have been using MyNetDiary for several years. It has always had great food database. The barcode scanning feature is awesome. The newest update with the redesigned lock it makes the app more fun. I am a registered dietitian and I frequently recommend the app in any of its forms for clients of mine. Nice job with the latest update.

title: Life Changing App
body: This app has become my go to app! My wife and I use it and are extremely satisfied! Love it and the fact that it is helping us change our lives. I had open heart surgery 2 months ago, after suffering a heart attack, so a like change was necessary. This app is doing just that. Thanks!

title: Perfect tool for recording and maintaining blood glucose.
body: Used in combination with MyNetDiary, I've been able to not only record my glucose readings, but also lower them, gain control and even lose weight and become more active.

title: Good for new Type 2 Diabetic
body: It has enabled me to look at my food intake and understand how it affects my diabetes. Tracking food and medications has also enabled me to begin losing wait. The food database is excellent and has led to many surprises about how many calories are in some of these innocuous seeming foods. That has led to better choices.

title: Great app.
body: This app helps me to keep count of all my calories I eat in a day. I love the fact you can scan in information from prepackaged items! I am still learning how to operate all the items this app has to offer! I believe it is one of the best investments in my health I've made.... Now to talk my family into joining!🤗

title: Great App
body: I used this app when I was in a pre-diabetic stage, and it helped me to track not only my sugar levels, but my calories as well. Using it allowed me to see where and how I needed to cut down, and on what.

title: Thanks for making it easier to track!
body: I've been a die hard Diabetes Pilot user for 7 years but this app is the first to make logging, tracking, planning and over all planning simple and easier!!!!! This app has a great user interface and is a great example of ease of use. Thank you

title: Good app, very helpful
body: I'm 65 with type 2. I've been using this app for 11 weeks and I've lost 20 lbs, my A1C dropped to 6.2 and my Dr took me off insulin. I did a little research on diabetic diets and what not to eat. THE WHITE STUFF. And this app really helps with the tracking, food grading, blood glucose monitoring. My only issue is not being able to connect my Fitbit to this app to accurately monitor my exercising

title: BEST DIET TOOL & HEALTH TRACKER AVAILABLE
body: Used it for the past two years and it keeps me on track, lost 40+lbs. Will continue using it when I reach my goal! I also use it to track my glucose levels and blood pressure. My doctors are really impressed with how motivated this app has made me. Best advice: Be Honest, write everything that goes in your mouth. Good luck!!!

title: Love this App!!
body: I really enjoy using this app! It's much more of what I needed for minding my diabetes, exercise and food all in one. Very satisfied! I had to use 2 apps before and the exceed use trackers would sometimes pause while riding my bike or walking and then I wouldn't get the actual mileage and calories burned. So far so good!! 😀👍

title: Great App
body: This app has really helped me to take control of my type 2 diabetes from when I was diagnosed back in April 2016 at around 550 and now I average around the high 90s to low 100s and I lost close to 50lbs and I'm off insulin.

title: The last two updates have really improved this app
body: Excellent app for tracking all the important information I must track to keep my Type 2 diabetes in excellent control. I been using this app since it first came out. It was ok to start now it is great. Easy to use.

title: Great App!
body: I've used this app daily to track my nutrition & calorie intake & weekly to track my blood glucose levels. I've lost 23 pounds in three months by changing my lifestyle & reducing carbs & sugars and exercising regularly. This app allows me to track all of those metrics & more. Excellent food database & food check scanner. Great job!

title: The App for Diabetes Control
body: If you need to get serious about controlling carbs, blood sugar and losing weight this is the app...

title: Newly diagnosed
body: I recently was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes and was looking for help with carb counting. I am a thin guy who has never had to watch what I eat or drink so this was hard for me. Though my sugars are still a bit high due to finding a balance with insulin this app has helped tremendously with watching what I eat. Thank you

title: This app has saved my life!
body: I suffered a TIA stroke two years ago. This app has helped me loose 85 lbs since, stay on track with my insulin and blood sugar and learn more about me than anything I've tried to date. I would highly, highly recommend this app and it's running companion. They are so worth it!

title: Great and easy to use app
body: This app has helped me manage my diet and diabetes more than anything else. I am not very tech savvy so what I needed most was a program to help me track my meals and blood glucose levels that was easy to use and understand. This app provides all that and more. I highly recommend.

title: Changed My Life !
body: Have been a type II diabetic for 8 years and up until finding this app and the Dietary app, had trouble monitoring my diet and blood sugar. Only used these apps for 1 week but I already feel like I have both under control and am ready to take control of my life, thank you MyNetDiary !

title: Useful
body: The app is very useful. It helps me keep track of what I'm doing, therefore I am more conscious of what I'm doing. I like that the home screen can be customized so you only see what you want/need to see. I wish there were a couple more things I could do on it to prevent me from having to use other apps as well, but all in all, it's a great app.

title: So far...
body: So far I love it. Have only entered a few days...I guess I have some questions, like can I export a data to a spreadsheet?  I'm hoping this app can help me understand how the insulin works in my body with regard to timing and food choices...my doctor also likes it for food accountability...more later!

title: Great for diabetes and carb counting
body: This app is great for the sheer number of things it does. It tracks foods pretty well, has a barcode scanner, tracks glucose and other labs like A1C, tracks weight and other measurements, and helps a lot with carb counting. It is about as good as My Fitness Pal, but has additional features for diabetics. Worth the money!

title: Helpful
body: Really gives you an accurate overview health wise on either a daily or monthly outlook. I only wished it would show you your HcA1 count after 3 months on the Blood Glucose chart. It also helps you excess the changes you need to improve for better health and weight loss.

title: Great App!
body: This app has it all for me. One place to manage and record everything I need to keep track of. Blood glucose, medications, weight, blood pressure, diet, and even water intake!  I am strongly considering buying the 'maximum' membership plan online so I can print out charts to show my doctor when the time comes.

title: Well Pleased
body: This is an excellent program for type2 diabetics like myself. The feedback on diet helps me with controlling the disease. I lost 3 lbs the first week just by using the feedback to modify my diet and am getting more consistent blood sugar readings. Also able to send info to my physician very easily.  Highly recommend this app to fellow diabetics.

title: Great App for weight loss and tracking diabetes
body: The best way to lose weight (for me at least), is to keep track of what I eat.  This makes you think twice before going for that <enter your weakness here!>.

title: Great for Ketogenic Diet (eg atkins)
body: I don't have diabetes but the app is perfect for counting Net Carbs and calories.  Great barcode database and easy to enter foods.  The search tool for foods could be a bit better (results are pretty random) and I'd like to see more items saved to the favorites list. But overall it's a great tool for kickstarting a new lifestyle!

title: To away the guesswork. Easy to use!
body: This app is hands-down the best and most useful application I have ever had on my iPhone. I would have paid five times as much for these amazing features. If you are someone who is serious about your health or newly diagnosed with diabetes this is the app for you.

title: Almost there
body: For a newly diagnosed diabetic, this app has been the biggest aid to me so far. It lets me know or log all of my information for easy reference at the doctors. My only issue is that a few functions seem cryptic and the help feature isn't much assistance. Other than that, I love it.

title: Amazing!
body: I needed this app and I'm so glad I found it. It lets me monitor weight loss, blood pressure, blood sugar, and most of all carbs and sugars in my food that effect blood sugar. The reports that are available for printing to take to my physician can be detailed or general and are so easy to access/create. It has truly been a life saver!

title: Excellent App!
body: As a recently diagnosed type 2 diabetic this app has proven to be exactly what I needed to track my daily dietary intake, medications, etc. It has become the most valuable app on my phone. Seamless online tracking transfers to my phone and updates instantly. Thank you for this wonderful tool!

title: Helped me fight diabetes
body: This app is great for tracking exercise, food, blood sugar and blood pressure. The food can be a little frustrating though because when you put in a general food it brings up hundreds of brand names instead of just generic food values. It's still worth it though. I love looking at the graphs and seeing my improvements.

title: Excellent but get me a full blown iPad interface
body: Product has been an immense help with my diet and testing, I've dropped almost 50 points on my average test making me and my doctor happy.

title: The best I have found.
body: I have tried several diabetes apps and this is the one I currently use. Aside from the diabetes-specific features, it is the best food-logging and diet app - especially since you can enter food in grams which is surprisingly not true of other popular apps.

title: Great app for mobility
body: This is a great app if you new to track your calories and nutrients on the go. The online version is not as good though. Anyways, the meals database is huge and you can add your own meals and foods. I submitted a couple of suggestions to their team and they were pretty responsive. I'd say this is one of the best nutrition tracking apps available out there.

title: Love it !
body: I like this app a lot. It is easy to use and gives me plenty of data.

title: Great app, two minor gripes.
body: I love this app, but I have three small complaints.

title: Great for beginners or more experienced patients
body: Track everything one could need and more. Being able to calculate calories burned for any number of activities encourages parties toon in yet more activities. The ability to sync with a meter would really top it off!

title: Disappointed
body: Bought this app because it would let me track my blood glucose as well as my food. It also promised to provide reports & charts I could provide to my physician. Turns out you have to get a "max" account to get those features, & that is around $60 per year. Feels like a bait & switch to me. The food database is not as good as my fitness pal. The only real positive is that it does give a good nutrition summary. I'm sorry I paid $10 for this.

title: Young skinny fat diabetic
body: I've been using this for 3 years to track my blood sugar and food. It's powerful in that it has lots of food data to utilize, I've only had to enter in a handful of products. It's helped me stay off diabetic medication by tracking my meals and watching my blood sugar.

title: Best App Ever!
body: I can't stress how intuitive and helpful this is-- worth every penny for the full version. I can track my glucose, measurements, Ha1c, BP, and it calculates daily, weekly, monthly reports to email my doctors of everything! This is a must for anyone who's serious about tracking food, sugar, exercise, etc !

title: I New diabetic's dream monitor
body: Just recently diagnosed with diabetes and in 6 weeks have lost 10 lbs watching carbs and calories.  The BG chart enables constant watch to keep it normal.  I've shown it to all the diabetes coaches and nurses and they now pass it on too.  It keeps you honest grocery shopping with bar scan too.

title: Very Good in All Aspects
body: I have been using this app after using other ones. This one gives the complete package. The food database seems geared towards eating out or buying pre cooked meals. Entering homemade meals takes some patience. Everything else is complete. Much easier than using separate apps for glucose  and diet tracking.

title: Good app, but not worth $10
body: Does quite a few things but seems like holding lot of features to get you sign up for monthly fee, ridicules. Food database is really poor. Reports and charts are jokes. Hardly any customization allowed. Some free app do better job on this. Only thing I likes it's ease of entering data which is important for doing things again and again. If I get a chance I will ask for refund and use some other app.

title: Excellent App
body: I am using this App for monitoring my diabetes for over a year and the updated version along with previous versions were excellent. The weekly overview in the latest version is one of the best features which I am liking it. Keep it up with the good work.

title: Pretty awesome
body: This app is surprisingly extremely helpful for tracking food and blood sugars for my type 1 diabetes. Also, I like how I can list my insulin doses and the charts it creates for weight, blood sugars, and insulin. So far I haven't had any issues with this app! Overall, I'm very impressed.

title: Great Tool
body: Have used this off & on about 5 years.  Simple to use and nice to have available anytime.  When any uncertainty of portion, I always 'round up' (cheat and you only hurt yourself).  Great reality check and motivational app.  I have told many friends about it.   Highly recommend.

title: Life-changing app
body: Dramatic but true if one is serious about managing diabetes. Some quirks but support has been responsive and integration with website  is excellent. 20 lbs lighter and diabetes under control so has been life changing for me.

title: Helpful
body: I was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes three weeks ago and this app has been incredibly helpful.  This has been a major life change but this app has made it a little easier.  Iran into a couple of problems when scanning a barcode but other than that it is useful.

title: Big Help!
body: I really like this app. Many choices as to what you can log! I love the alerts and reminders as well as the diabetic tips it gives you. It works with the health app on my IPhone and with my Apple Watch. It was expensive but so far has been worth it.

title: Excellent tracking app
body: This application is the cornerstone of my diabetes tracking. Weight, diet, activities, along with blood glucose level tracking covers all the bases. I also appreciate the integration with other apps and tracking devices. My only negative is the cost of the annual subscription. I wish it were less.

title: Just ok
body: This app has a nice design and customization I love. There are a few missing features that give me pause.

title: Feel ripped off
body: The app itself is great, and I wish I could give it 5 stars.  But My Glucose readings are not seen on my online account, and I can not print out reports unless I upgrade to a monthly payment account.  MyNetDiary should charge much less than the $9.99 for the app.

title: Best app
body: This app has been the best thing I have downloaded, I have changed my way of eating and this app has helped me do it. I don't put any food in my body until I check it out on here first!  So far I have lost 27lbs and wouldn't give up this app up for anything !!  Great app!!

title: Near perfect!
body: Such a great - and helpful - app!! Meal/calorie tracking is so easy and offers so much more than Lose It, which I used briefly before I found this one. Love the charts on here and ability to enter measurements! All in all, this is the best of these types of apps that I've found!

title: Great app
body: I have been using mynetdiary D since June. It has helped me stay on course with my eating and watching my blood glucose levels. Entering all my food is very easy and being able to watch my carb intake makes all the difference.

title: Easy to use
body: I've been using the app to keep carb intake in check. Because of minor dietary changes, I've actually lost weight and am eating healthier.  There's no guilt when I snack because I know exactly how many carbs I'm consuming before hand.

title: Fun to use!!
body: This App takes the "scarey" out of taking my blood glucose level and blood pressure because then I get to record them in this cool App.  I know, weird, but ya do what you've got to do!!  This App is very well designed and runs great!!  Does more than I'll ever need but it's nice to have to use!  Love this App!!

title: Great Ap!!
body: I have used this Ap for about two years now to help me count carbs. My diabetes is the best it's ever been. Great A1cs and I've lost 60 pounds! This is the easiest way I've found to keep track of my dietary needs and control my diabetes. Thank you! I tell folks about your Ap all the time!

title: Thank You!  Great App!!
body: I am newly diagnosed Diabetic. As an avid iPhone user it is my go to for useful apps to help me out. I was so happy to find MyNetDiary. It has helped me track, not only my diabetes, but my diet and medications. The daily analysis and tip and hints for my activity and diet have taught me a lot.

title: Hands down the best I've found
body: I've used this for years.  Each improvement gets better.  I love the ability to mix in exercise, food, and other measurements like blood glucose, etc.  I love tracking data and this app is the best.

title: Mynet Diary
body: This is the most complete and easy complete diet tracking app. And it has a vast number of food items in its database already and if you need to add a new one it is super easy. This is one Outstanding diet diary tracking app. IMO the best tracker as it even tracks your exercise calories spent.

title: Great
body: I like this app a lot. It is nice and easy to use. I'd like to see my Glucose average for a period of time and if it was near the first screen, that would be convenient. I see the average for the day, but was hoping for maybe an average of my choice (2 week, 1 month, etc.).

title: Almost a 5
body: Everything you want in tracking blood sugar, insulin and everything else. Well thought out and complete. Customer service was fast and thorough but the food database is bazaar with restaurant and processed food but basic foods are hard to find. Clean up that and it would be perfect.

title: Very useful app
body: I have found this app to be indispensable in tracking all aspects of my daily health numbers. This app hasit all...food intake, exercise, glucose, blood work, and several other tracking tools. Should be the only tool you need to monitor your health.

title: Glad I got the diabetes version
body: Wow. Glad I moved up to this version.  It allows me to do a very low carb, high fat keto diet and get my blood sugar back down. The Pro version put up a fight about the ketogenic diet parameters, and of course no BS tracking.

title: Good Health
body: MyNetDiary has very informative tips and articles. After you learn how to use the app, like track what you eat, measurements, and liquids, you  are motivated to improve your life. I like, that you can input your own recipes to keep track of calories/carbohydrates!

user_name: The nickname "Metalsmith" is taken, because it's MINE!
title: Oh?
body: Long time later: still doesn't work. They've quit answering my e-mail query's. They've got my money, I've got a program that turns itself off if I do anything!  Touch the screen---Zap! Program shuts down. Too bad there are no negative

title: Saving my life!
body: This app is literally saving my life. I have lost 70 pounds and have got my diabetes under control in a little under a year. I have gone from a HgbA1C of 11 to a 4.9!!! I am off all my insulin now. I give the credit to this marvelous app and it's note taking abilities. Bravo!!!

title: Lack of food info
body: When I scan some food or enter it manually I expect it to show up or at least be the right food I'm scanning.  Instead I'm having to enter most things manually.  My fitness pal is much better for this where I've never had a problem with foods not showing up.  Fix your database for food & I'll give it 5 stars.

title: Love this app
body: I do not have diabetes however i love that i am able to track cholesterol and protein/fat/carbs, i gave it 4 stars because they need to improve the cholesterol tracking, i cant see my old numbers unless i know the day i put them in i think that area can be improved

title: Lifesaver
body: This app got me back on track after a prolonged slip. Thanks to this app I have been able to lose weight, gain control over my diet, and bring my A1c back into the normal range. I was facing going on insulin so this is huge! I continue to use the app every day.

title: Diabetes Tracker by  MyNetDiary
body: I just recieved a wonderful e-mail from the CEO of MyNetDiary Diabetes Tracker. His concern about adding the e-mail function to the app is very welcome and it will only make this app the best one anywhere. I am so gald he is willing to see to this personally and it will be coming in the second release of updates I have been told. Like me be patient and it will be comming. Thanks so very much build team .

title: Best I've tried
body: I've been trying to get a handle on my weight and blood glucose for a while now. Once you get used to the system, MND has the best food list around. I've lost 25# in the five months since I started.

title: Outstanding
body: I was recently diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. This app has helped me keep track of my carbs so I can correlate my blood glucose with what I'm eating. I give this app a lot of credit for helping me get things under control so quickly! Highly recommended.

title: Simple to Use
body: As a recently diagnosed diabetic, I've found this app to be very helpful and easy to use. And being able to track so many things at the so many things at the same time puts this app above the rest.

title: Great app!
body: This is a great app! I LOVE that everything is in this one app - exercise, food journal, meds, and so much more. I do t have to track food, meds, exercise in 3 different apps. I just got an iWatch, and I'm looking forward to combining the app & watch to track my exercise and activity.

title: Love this app!
body: While there are a few reporting features I wish this had and the ability to fax it to my doctor, I love this app and so does my doctor.  As a recently diagnosed diabetics with poor executive functioning skills, it has helped me to be successful in doing the things my doctor has asked.  Thank you!

title: Simply Amazing.
body: This is what I've been looking for in an app to help track my type 1 diabetes.

title: What new dashboard?
body: Oct 2016 update says "beautiful new dashboard..."??? What new dashboard? It looks exactly the same. Update also says you can turn off the new board if you prefer the old look. I don't even see an option for that to see what, if anything, truly is different. Still love the app. 4 stars

title: Great app
body: Have been using for almost three months. I love the app. I paid $10 for it, I just wish for that price it synced with my Fitbit. I know I can sync, but I don't want to pay $60/year after already paying for the app.

title: 3 years & still using
body: I was diagnosed three years ago, went to the hospital with sugar around 300. This great app has really helped me keep on track. My sugar is under control I lost 40 pounds and have kept it off for more than three years.

title: Very good tracker
body: Best tracker out there.

title: Worth the money!
body: I love the user interface. Wonderful functions, the food label scanner is so helpful, and the ease of creating custom foods helps me not have to estimate anything!  It's easy to use, and so far I haven't found any features to be lacking!

title: Works well for non-standard calorie tracking
body: Changed from other tracker to get the time of day view for calories, etc since I eat 5-6 smaller meals each day.  Very helpful tracking for non-standard eating and exercise patterns.

title: Love it!
body: Great app!  It's been a wonderful tool to help me keep my recently diagnosed type 2 diabetes under control!  Hoping to come off meds soon!  So easy to track food, bg levels, exercise and weight!  Love the food scanning feature.  It's the best app I've found!

title: Great app
body: I was diagnosed very recently and this app has been the best thing. It helps me track my BG levels and put in what I eat so I know how much insulin to take based on my carbs. Without this app, I wouldn't be able to track anything and I'd be so lost. I'm so happy for this :)

title: Best diabetes tracker I've found
body: This is super flexible, allows me to send reports to my doctor and keeps track of my diet and exercise all in one place. I've been using it for about 6 months now and I love it. The only flaw is me. I forget to enter in my stuff.

title: Very good
body: This program gives you a lot of options for monitoring your lifestyle. I would prefer a favorites list for food and for exercise. It would also be helpful in the exercise section if they included programs from Beach Body and programs like Beach Body. Otherwise, it's very useful

title: I love it!
body: It's awesome it reminds me of my sugars it keeps me on track on my cals and food habits, it gives me tips on how I can keep my self in check. Only con I have is that it should up date on the activities and food options for newer restaurants and bars so that the custom part is more accurate.

title: Great app for managing your health
body: I love this app! It gives me everything I need to quickly make responsible food choices. I am prediabetic and trying to live a lifestyle that will keep it that way. I highly recommend you give this one a try.

title: Absolutely Love It
body: Wonderful App!  I like it because it keeps track of everything I need to maintain a health lifestyle as well as monitor blood sugar, blood pressure, medications and diet. The fact that I also know on a daily basis what I lack in nutrients is quite helpful. I'm glad I chose My Net Diary. I love it.

title: Very helpful
body: I have had a much easier time with caring for my diabetes with this app.  Tracking what I ate revealed some surprises.  Sub 7 A1c since I started using this app.

title: Really like it!!
body: I needed to get back on track and during my last couple of appts they were not able to pull the data from my meters so having this was a god send! I would improve by allowing other medications to be tracked in here as well that I take on a regular basis.

title: Sturdy but limited app
body: I have pre- diabetes and I think this app is one of the best tracking apps out there right now. With that said, although MyNetFiary has a vast array of foods it recognizes, for costing an outrageous 60 dollars per year for premium services, it's library of foods is extremely limited. Plus, Latin American popular foods ARE not listed or even recognized and have to be added, and trust we are inputting the correct data there.

title: Good but needs works
body: I like the app a lot but get disappointed that they cannot keep up the database like MyFitnessPal.  MyFitnessPal has a much larger data base.  I was just looking for a beer I drink and it was not in this app but MyFitnessPal had it and many many many more.  I'd give this app 5 stars if they could get their database up to what is available in MyFitnessPal.

title: AWESOME!
body: This app is everything you could ever want to help you manage your health goals! Incredibly user friendly! My husband bought it as well. I'm grateful to have this tool during my weight loss endeavor and to take control of my diabetes!

title: Very Helpful
body: Been using for over a month now...and it's helped me manage my diet and bgl to get a gold star report from my doctor. Meets my needs as a type 2 diabetic. Now helping me manage losing about 30 more pounds...35 down already! WooHoo!

title: Perfect
body: Exactly what I was looking for. Love the reporting functionalities and desktop access. Worth every penny. Recommend upgrading subscriptions, too, to get full access to the website and all of the reporting features.

title: Great tracker
body: I like the flexibility of this tracker.  I can use is on multiple devices which makes it very easy.  The food grade feature has helped me track the quality of the food I eat.  Will worth the annual fee.

title: Love this app to manage diabetes
body: Super easy to use, especially when it remembers prior entries to quickly add those foods back in quickly. All the pieces work well together to help make food management and medication tracking.

title: love this app!
body: I have been using this app for years and absolutely love it!  So easy to navigate, create and save recipes and get new things entered. I've recommended it to several friends who love it too. Keep up the great updates!

title: Can't stand it
body: I have tried a lot of different apps for my diabetes and carb control and thought this app was the right one. Wrong. It is not at all user friendly. Entering in the food is a pain and difficult.  Scanner does not work even after paying usd 10. Shame on you. Layout is not good and after using the fantastic app "lose it" for carb control, all I can say is this was a waste of money. I don't use it as free apps are better.

title: Very helpful
body: Tried several other apps before this one. This one works, and works well! If you are trying to control diabetes and/or lose weight, I highly recommend this app.

title: Great App
body: Teaches me what I need to learn to get going caring for myself as I was just diagnosed with this condition, type 2 age onset. Now going on 4 months, this app is the best. Everything to keep on course is here! Keep it going! It keeps me from needing medication, as my A1C is 5%. Thank you.

title: Choose what you need.
body: After many years of using electronic logs to enter Diabetes data, and a different app to track fitness.

title: Great app
body: Makes following your day and tracking everything very easy. Intuitive interface and the food database is great. Lost 6 pounds in the first week. I have my glucose levels where they need to be.

title: Love it!
body: Great app. Easy to use to use. Tracks everything. Love that it syncs with my fit bit and scale!  Just wish the food information covered more restaurants.  When I eat out i have to build a recipe from scratch and don't think I get it right many of the time.

title: Changed my life!
body: This app is the most comprehensive of all blood glucose tracking that I've used.  The daily averages, food monitoring, exercise tracking proved me with a complete overview on where I'm at for the day, week, month and on.

title: Super app
body: I love that I can track everything, and have it all in one. Even lets me connect my Fitbit. Adding and tracking food is super easy. Also has a web based site to view even more.

title: Best diabetic tool!!
body: It has its flaws but in the end it keeps me in line and on track. I love the reminders and articles. More importantly, I love the search capabilities. I am Type 2 Diabetic and have dropped 15 pounds. This app has helped me manage my diabetes!! 💜💜💜💜

title: Needs some work
body: I can't get the waych app to work. It tells me to setup the app on my phone to use the watch app. I've been using the app on my phone for months.

title: Awesome
body: I am new to this app.  I find it to be very user friendly.   Other apps I have tried have been disappointing.  This app gives me all I need to track my day with ease of use and clarity.  I will recommend it to my friends.

title: Excellent!
body: I've tried other apps, but none give me the flexibility to make enrtries on my phone and Mac. Love the export data function. Great for tracking blood sugars, medication, meals, exercises, and even has a place to record notes and vitamins. Love it!!!

title: Very Helpful for Type 1
body: Great tool for an insulin-using diabetic. The beauty of the system is that it has all of the important metrics tracked in one app. I highly recommend because good food, exercise, insulin, and blood glucose tracking is the first step to achieving a target A1c!

title: Great app
body: I love this app. It is so easy to track bg's and insulin, including basal amounts.  For a small fee you can view the diabetes charts on the web.  My last 1AC was 8.1, way to high. But with this tracker I hope to bring it down.  Highly recommend this app.

title: Exceeds expectations!
body: I started using this app about a two weeks ago. Unlike most apps that “almost” solve a problem and fall disused, this one is literally just what the doctor ordered. The ease of data entry is delightful!

title: Great!
body: Been using it about 5 weeks.  Love the charts for tracking and being able to email and then print reports. I tried several other apps but this has been the best for me.

title: Requires $5-9/month pro account to NOT get email notifications
body: Sorry, but I’m not going to spend $5-9/month just so you won’t send me email notifications.

title: Great app
body: Overall, this is a great app. and it meets my needs of diabetic and weight monitoring.  In the future, I look forward to the integration of multiple technologies and the ability to easily get this information transferred into electronic medical health records.

title: Easy to Use; Hard to Put Down
body: Must say that I am quite pleased with this app. It has been quite helpful to me in tracking blood glucose levels, monitoring medications, and tracking eating habits. It gives me a picture of what my habits are - what's good and not so good. All in all, I love it!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Great!
body: This app allows me to make better food decisions with its grading system for food.  It also is the best app I've used for monitoring my sugar.  The reminders help slow down my busy day and check my sugars like I'm suppose to.

title: This app has been a life style changing miracle
body: This app makes it so easy to make the dietary changes needed for a diabetic. It truly changed my whole way of making food choices that are right for me.

title: Awesome
body: This is a great program for diet tracking. It's hard to understand your daily intake until you see it like this. It has helped me tremendously to adjust the parts of my diet that I couldn't figure out.

title: It's very helpful and easy to use!
body: I work hard and don't like to take a lot of time to deal with tracking all the things I should. If your iPhone is attached to the end of your arm like mine, it's very easy to keep up with one more thing. Thank you for this app.

title: Outstanding!
body: Perfect for tracking a low carb diet. The only app that gives net carbs.

title: Perfect for a diabetic.
body: I really love this APP, it is perfect for a diabetic. Able to keep great records for my doctor and makes me feel great when changes look great for me.

title: Excellent App
body: Love the time stamp on your entries; allows you to track how you are distributing your nutrient intake during the day. Also, I can track my medications and the times I take them. Just a comfortable to use, helpful app.

title: So useful!
body: There are so many great things about this app! The only thing I'm having any issue with is the auto import of data from my Garmin...otherwise, so happy with all other aspects of this app!

title: Best Personal Health App!
body: One of my favorite apps!!!! Easy to record since I always have my phone. Love using the scanner . It Keeps track of everything I need without thinking and trying to calculate carbs, fat, sugars, etc.

title: Great App
body: Great app. Easy to use. Best way to track numbers and have them available to show Doctor.  Rating a 4 instead of 5 for one reason ... Just missing some average foods--not a problem because they are easy to add and have available thereafter.

title: My first review and impression after a week of use.
body: I really like this app! My only trouble so far is entering food items consumed at home that are not scannable. This will probably become easier as time goes by.

title: Easy and accurate
body: Great app!!  Easy to use. Love that I can store my favorite meals.  Also easy to add things with the barcode scanner. And my diabetes eduacator loves that I can sent her emails in between our meetings. Well worth getting

title: Excellent App!!
body: I use this app everyday to keep track of my blood glucose levels and also how much insulin I take.  There are many great features with this app.  It tracks what you it and how you exercise.

title: Fix this BUG!!!
body: I've commented on this 3x over the past 6 months... When entering data, if the keyboard is up and you didn't enter an amount, an error message comes up and you can't see/select "ok" because it's behind the keyboard.  The ONLY WAY to get past this is to completely power down the phone and restart it. NO APP should force this action!

title: Best comprehensive app
body: I aM a type 2 diabetic. Money well spent for a professional grade app.  Tried 4 others and this is the best.  Interface is clean and well though-out.

title: Great app
body: I love the fact that I can keep track of all the food that I have for my diet. And to keep track on my glucose levels. It's also really awesome that I have the option of scanning the food I eat. I just wish I could give you an A1 C average rating.

title: Great Blood Glucose App!!
body: This app is the best I've seen. Has everything you could ever want. Food easy to enter. Logging blood glucose score very simple. Uses the app on iPhone and logs all your steps. It's awesome! Makes a dreaded task a little more bearable.

title: New update
body: I have had only a few hours to play around on it, but so far I am liking it very much.  Only negative so far is when listing medicines-it doesn't tell you which med u had.  All it says is one medicine not a big help in an emergency situation.

title: Been there done that
body: I have many apps for keeping of food intake. Easy entry. The new interface is great. Why do I use this app, because it also tracks diabetic info. Also. Please make a native iPad app

title: More  expandablity
body: Great program. Has lots of abilities.

title: Great app with some glitches
body: I have been using this app for a while now and I love it. However, with the most recent update, I can no longer use the barcode scanner. As soon as I open the scanner the app shuts down. Also, going into a nutritional label on a food shuts the app down. I think I could love the app again if these glitches are fixed.

title: Very helpful app
body: Am new to some of the knowledge needed for managing pre-diabetic glucose levels and have found the app informative and an effective tool in helping me stay on track with exercise and a prudent food choices.

title: User
body: I have been using this app for over two months.  It is easy to use and very helpful.

title: Invaluable aid to management of diabetes
body: MyNetDiary D provides all the tools needed for a Type 2 diabetic to manage both blood sugar and weight. Nutrition library is extensive and extremely helpful for tracking carbs and calories.

title: Great tool
body: So far it is great. About 2 weeks now. Have tried others and this is way beyond them. Have been a diabetic for 30 years. This is a great tool. Having a little trouble creating some of the options, but am working at it.

title: Fantastic
body: I have been using this app for years. I love how easy it is to use. Entering  food is a snap. I love the way I can analyze  what I have eaten daily. A perfect food score allows me to duplicate the meal again and know it's very healthy.

title: I love this app
body: This has to be one of the best apps I have on my phone it's really helping me keep track with my diabetes and my weight I would recommend this to anyone who wants to lose weight

title: Perfect app!
body: The calorie counter is so easy to use since you can scan so many foods and get an instant grade rating to make sure you're eating well, and the charts are a great visual tool to check progress

title: This app is my new best friend!
body: I was recently diagnosed with pre-diabetes and given 1 month by my doctor to get my blood sugar average down. Not only did this app help me reach my goal, but I am losing weight effortlessly by following its guidance. It is awesome!!!

title: Pre-diabetic newbie
body: This app has helped me to monitor my lifestyle and allows me to make good choices… or bad ones for that matter, I but with this app I know how bad they are. I've never been a label watcher but this makes it easy to do.

title: I like it better than MyFitnessPal
body: I am a low-carb/keto dieter and count net carbs and the diabetic version allows me to do that seamlessly. Plus the database is huge so I generally don't have a problem finding what I'm looking for.

title: Very thorough app!
body: The app will be as good or great as you make it. The app tracks food, weight, blood sugar levels, and much, much more. I highly recommend it. It really is a one stop shop for nutrition, exercise, and diabetic tools.

title: Amazing!
body: This app has been amazing! It has been great helping me to keep my sugar levels in check. I highly recommend this app if you really want to see what kind of crap we shove into our mouthes.

title: Helping me through Gestational Diabetes
body: I'm using this app to help me track my food and blood glucose levels during just gestational diabetes it's really great and I wouldn't be able to do it without it.

title: Great!!!
body: I haven't found anything food / health related that this doesn't track.  I use it to monitor my Type 2, I love how easy it is to add data, track data and get feedback.

title: Best Diabetic/ Weight loss app ever!
body: By far this is my favorite app. I can not only track the foods I eat but also my blood sugars and then can see through charts how what I am eating is affecting my diabetes as well as my weight.

title: RevSalt
body: I like this app but I wish it had a larger variety of foods you can log. The problem now is that you cannot always put in the food accurate because it will not allow you to make any adjustments. I really need it for my diabetes to track my food intake.

title: Decent app
body: I think overall the app has some nice features.   I wish they had a larger food and nutrition database.  A lot of times I have to look stuff up.   I wish their blog was more diabetes focused instead of weight loss focused.   And my only other complaint is the cost is a lot higher than many of the other diabetes apps out there.

title: I use it everyday
body: There are many apps that help you chart activities, blood glucose,etc. but I find this is the best app to monitor you diet. It gives you the analysis and it has be pretty accurate. Great app.

title: MyNetDiary D
body: Great for diabetes and food consumption tracking. Can also track blood pressure, heart rate, medications and many others. This app keeps getting better as the developer actively supports this app. Kudos to the developers!

title: Life-saving!
body: So easy to use; all you have to do is stay focused! (Yeah, that's the tough part.) It's the only app out there that conveniently tracks glucose readings along with nutrition, water and exercise. I highly recommend MyNetDiary.

title: Best ever
body: This is the best ap purchase I've ever made. I use it daily, all day long. Entering foods is super simple. I love how I can track everything in one place and see trends with my blood sugar. It links my Fitbit info too. Love love love it.

title: Great Tracker
body: User friendly app that tracks everything.  Most foods are included in database. Barcode scanner does not work as well as other applications & adding recipes is more difficult but am overall pleased.

title: Works well!
body: I like the graphs that it is able to present. It is easy to enter data and I like the idea of entering glucose and several other data items.

title: New Diabetic
body: I was newly diagnosed with Type 2 diabetes this summer. This app has been invaluable in helping me track my glucose levels & my food intake. Fast, easy, & transfers data between my iPad & iPhone so I can take it with me wherever I go. Love it & highly recommend it.

title: Love this App
body: I just got diagnosed with diabetes and this app has enabled me to get on track within days. It is so easy to use and tracks everything you need. Highly recommended.

title: Excellent App!
body: Does everything I need it to do. Would highly recommend this to other diabetics or anyone wanting to track their progress.

title: Love the app!
body: I love the app and have been using it for years (on and off). I only wish they had more 'unusual' types of foods already calculated it. I'm a gluten free vegan and my food choices are not always there.

title: Great App for Diabetics
body: I downloaded this app from the hospital I was in after being diagnosed with type 2. It has helped a lot and now with diet allows me to understand what i consume to manage my diabetes. Great app!!

title: Very helpful
body: As a recently diagnosed type 2 diabetic, this app has helped me as I try to learn how to eat better, lose weight and be healthier.

title: Great manual data entry
body: It is very easy to enter data or modify existing data.  Cues for food intake work very well.  Insulin and bg entry is easy as well.  Data export is ok if you want preformatted spreadsheets, but raw data is very hard to get.

title: Well done app.
body: I was diagnosed a few weeks ago and this is already helping me. It's great to have your diabetes and diet information in one user friendly app at your finger tips.

title: Impressive but lacks a lot of barcodes to scan
body: I really enjoy this app. One of the few to combine diabetes and weight loss. But I do wish it had more foods in the database. And whenever I try to scan a barcode it is not in the system.

title: GRATEFUL!
body: My A1C went from 9.6 down to 6.8 in 3 months because I could see how foods effected my blood glucose. This app literally showed me what I foods worked with me and which foods were killing me. I am forever grateful for this app.

title: Thanks...
body: This app is much improved. It's still stuck in calories which I don't count. I got one whole day logged in before I hit the app's inability to receive my custom selections. I don't eat out. I don't eat prepackaged foods.

title: Fixed most problems with the latest version
body: Excellent app. Does everything I expect, and does it well. Food database a little sparse, but improving.

title: Put back Fitbit connection please!!!
body: I was in love with this app until it no longer synced with Fitbit. Months later now and still missing the Fitbit sync. Please put the sync back!

title: Great app!!
body: This app helps me in so many ways.  I'm able to keep track of everything.. Sugar levels, food intake exercise, you name it all in one place.  It's like a one stop shopping center for diabetes.  Thank you for creating such a great app!

title: Brilliant!!
body: Having just received the news that I was diabetic was completely overwhelming, but this app has helped organize me and help me get a handle on all the things I need to remember. This app is a literal lifesaver!

title: Great app!
body: Easy to use. Some of food names don't always make sense to me. Mfp has way more food listings. I like this one because I can record my glucose readings and food intake all in one place.

title: Tracking tool
body: It has been effective for me as a tracking tool for food exercise and water log that's handy and easy to use. Creates mindfulness.  Thanks

title: Very Comprehensive
body: Being able to track so many things in one spot is very attractive in this App. Thumps up to the dev team. Only comment is on the reporting aspect. Needs work in my opinion. Like everything else it'll get better.

title: Invaluable!
body: I'm diabetic & 6 months post kidney transplant.  I've been using this app since before my transplant and it's been so helpful in keeping track of my changing dietary requirements!  I'm addicted to it!

title: Keeps me informed
body: This app was suggested to me by my nutritionist. The app helps me track and provide information on how I am doing with my goals. I would recommend this app to others.

title: Good food app, needs work on diabetes
body: As far as the food part goes I love the ability to scan in my food and see where I stand on my nutrition. The diabetes part needs work though, would rather see a BG daily graph instead of the sugars being put into time slots.

title: Money well spent
body: Honestly, it is expensive. But it's money worth. I lost 25 lbs with the help of this app. Track all my health facts and print the report (which I'd love to select the reported details a bit better). All around, it's not perfect but close to.

title: Net Diary
body: The app that all type 2s should have to help keep records on just about everything their health.  The app does the job very well.  Helps to keep properly maintaining records for following my health.

title: Really useful!
body: So glad I found this app - SHOCKED at the nutrients of my fav foods!   The diary-log reminder notices really help - I have lost 18 lbs do far.  Nice feature to be able to add custom foods & the barcode reader is really quick to add foods.

title: Great app
body: This is the best app of its kind that I have come across. You can pick and choose how to use the info, stats and it's easy to use. And accurate.  A must have food tracker app!

title: Phenomenal
body: Absolutely love this app. Takes all the guess work out of it. I love that it also tracks my water, exercise and blood sugar readings. It really helps to keep me on track!

title: Keeps you honest
